about_the_game:
On a stormy night, Carla has a strange dream that keeps her worried. Along with the dream's concern comes the disappearance of Canuto, her cat.

In a way she cannot explain, she feels that the two things are connected...

The perfect combination of "Choose Your Own Adventure" and Survival Horror


Tale of Serendipity combines the mechanics of Choose Your Own Adventure and Survival Horror to deliver a short story of despair, confusion and obsession.

Your actions during the game will affect the outcome in unexpected ways and each game will bring surprises and relevant changes to the maps and objectives.

Evil lurks around every corner


Carla will have to face not only the mysteries and dangers of Veilchental, but also her own imagination and inner ghosts.

Relentless pursuits


Run away from your enemies, who will do their best to catch you. Be careful, some of them are extremely skilled, or completely unpredictable!

Fight your own thoughts


Can you trust yourself under pressure? Through Carla's thoughts, discover which ones help you progress and discover the truth, and which ones hinder you from succeeding out of fear or anxiety.

Unique cinematic style


Comic book fan? Enjoy hand-illustrated cinematics that narrate each situation with great detail and personality.

How can you survive?


To survive, Carla wrote down the following tips:

  • "If I make the wrong decision, there may be no turning back."
  • "I must hide so that they do not find me"
  • "When I feel my heart is about to burst, I know that danger is near."
  • "I must take notes and find clues, if I want to find out the truth."




If you're reading this, it means you've reached the end. You are awesome!!

We hope you like what you see here, please feel free to join the community to give us your feedback. Don't forget to add the game to your wishlist so you can keep up to date with upcoming news, announcements and events.
